channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, Episode 46, "Jeffrey Way of Laracasts"
channel.description: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-46-jeffrey-way-of-laracasts/ This week we have special guest Jeffrey Way. We talk about how he’s bootstrapped Laracasts, how he got started in Laravel, the philosophy behind Laracasts, pricing, hiring, building a personal brand, supporting open source, how to make a great screencast, working for The Man. - [Laracasts][1] Thanks to this weeks sponsor: Linode [1]: http://laracasts.com

“You can never truly take a vacation.”

This week we have special guest Jeffrey Way. We talk about how he’s bootstrapped Laracasts, how he got started in Laravel, the philosophy behind Laracasts, pricing, hiring, building a personal brand, supporting open source, how to make a great screencast, working for The Man.
